customerPain.title: Sales Teams Lose Deals Because Manual Work Slows Everything Down
customerPain.description: Manual follow-ups, disconnected tools, and slow response times cause leads to go cold and deals to slip away.

solution.title: One AI Workflow That Manages Your Entire Sales Journey from Lead to Close
solution.description: BoostMyDeal is an AI agent workflow platform that automates lead generation, qualification, outreach, and deal closing by connecting social media, CRMs, phone systems, scheduling tools, video conferencing, and more into a single seamless workflow.

feature1.title: AI-Powered Lead Capture From Social Platforms
feature1.description: BoostMyDeal automatically captures and qualifies leads from social media channels, ensuring instant engagement and zero lead leakage.

feature2.title: Automated AI Calling Agents — 24/7
feature2.description: BoostMyDeal automatically captures and qualifies leads from social media channels, ensuring instant engagement and zero lead leakage.

feature3.title: Connect With Any CRM — No Limitations
feature3.description: BoostMyDeal automatically captures and qualifies leads from social media channels, ensuring instant engagement and zero lead leakage.

feature4.title: Native Integration With Business PBX Providers
feature4.description: Connect your trusted PBX or VoIP provider directly to BoostMyDeal for real-time call handling, routing, and analytics.

feature5.title: AI-Driven Scheduling & Video Meetings
feature5.description: Automatically book meetings, Sync with calendars, Launch video calls with integrated conferencing tools.

feature6.title: Intelligent Email Automation That Closes Deals
feature6.description: SMTP email integration, AI email agents follow up automatically, Personalized responses at scale.
